article: australia has grounded its entire fleet of sea king helicopters after an initial investigation found that a possible mechanical fault may have contributed to the crash of one of them on indonesia 's nias island , killing nine service personnel , a senior navy officer said wednesday .
abstract: australian navy grounds all sea king helicopters after initial probe of nias crash
